bob.name: bob
bob.description: SQL query builder and ORM/Factory generator for Go with support for PostgreSQL, MySQL and SQLite

grade_notes.bulk_customers: Unable to use Load Data Infile, but able to use regular insert with many rows
grade_notes.create_sale: Unable to insert sale with sub-records, but able to insert sub-records using a helper after creating the sale
grade_notes.customer_sales: Able to use foreign key relationships for joins, also maps to arbitrary structs
grade_notes.json: No auto-marshalling/unmarshalling of JSON columns, json columns are recognized as json types
